game.name: HYPER PRIMATE
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Partial Controller Support, Steam Leaderboards, HDR available, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 바나나를 껍질을 벗기고, 격리에서 탈출하여 악취로 가득 찬 무기로 억압자들을 물리쳐라. 점수판을 정복하고, 가장 빠른 원숭이가 되어, 이 악취 가득한 파쿠르 슈터에서 뉴런을 활성화하라.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Speedrun as a HYPER FAST Ape in this parkour focused FPS. Dash, grapple, and blast through deadly obstacle courses using a massive arsenal of weapons. Master momentum, dodge death, and DOMINATE the leaderboards.
